name: Gaming while working? NO WAY!
description:
Play video games at work? ! That's absolutely impossible!
Ghostly boss, different dimension of colleagues, all to follow!
2 yuan comic imagination solution puzzle, play unchanged, magic upgrade!

It's impossible to skip work and play games! Is a unique puzzle puzzle imagination game, challenge your imagination, break your imagination, want to use 'common sense' to solve the puzzle? Pattern Tucson broken!
* lovely cartoon painting style, the whole style is very simple and easy, the player experience is very casual.
* each level has a different ending
* you need to use your brain to complete various imaginative puzzles and challenges to achieve the ultimate goal of skipping work and playing games
Use your fingers and let the joy follow you
